name: Fps Puzzler Prototype
description:
This is a VERY early prototype I have been working on for a future Fps Co-op puzzler game. At the moment there is no content other than messing around with some mechanics and guns, but it's still pre fun. Please download and try it out :)

Let me know what you think.

Controls:

F - Pick up random objects            Esc - Pause game

E - Pick up weapon                         Left click - Shoot

Q - Drop weapon                            Right click - Grapple (Blue Object in  the sky)

R - Reload                                        LeftCtrl - Slide/Crouch

SpaceBar - Jump
